com.flyingspaniel.nava.utils

Class EmittingCallbackFn<IN,OUT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flyingspaniel.nava.emit.Emitter
      • com.flyingspaniel.nava.utils.EmittingCallbackFn<IN,OUT>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Callback<IN,OUT>, Emit.IEmitter, Emit.IListener<IN>, Fn<IN,OUT>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EmittingCallbackFn.NOP, Request

    public abstract class EmittingCallbackFn<IN,OUT>
extends Emitter
implements Callback<IN,OUT>, Fn<IN,OUT>, Emit.IListener<IN>
    "Do It All" base class Subclasses must override callback(), and may want to override others
    Since:
    Copyright (c) 2013 by Morgan Conrad
    Author:
    Morgan Conrad
    See Also:
    This software is released under the MIT License

        callback in interface Callback<IN,OUT>
        Parameters:
        ex - null, or an Exception thrown from an earlier callback. You should test for this!

        more - additional input data (rarely used)

        result of processing

        Exception
